statements: DELETE FROM equipment_failures WHERE equipment_id = 100 AND alert_status = 'active';
DELETE FROM equipment_failures WHERE sensor_id = 200 AND alert_status = 'resolved';
DELETE FROM EquipmentFailures WHERE id = 1 AND equipment_id = 101;
DELETE FROM MaintenanceTeams WHERE contact_person = 'John Doe';

DELETE FROM equipment_failure_alerts
WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' AND alert_time < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE team_id = 201 AND alert_id in (SELECT alert_id from Alerts WHERE alert_timestamp < '2023-01-01');
